about_the_game:
SURVIVE


Hostile wildlife, and other players as you strive to survive. Craft tools, weapons, and shelters to sustain yourself. Gather resources to enhance your odds, and form alliances with other players to increase your chances of survival. The game also incorporates horror elements, adding an intense layer of fear and suspense to the survival challenges.

Co-op Gameplay

Survive alone or with friends. Share items and work together to build defences. Get support to explore above and below ground.

Farming

Farming, Embark on a thrilling survival adventure where you harness the wilderness to sustain your existence. Cultivate a new life by farming within the game's dynamic ecosystem. Gather seeds from the natural world and nurture your own garden to secure a steady supply of food. Engage in planting a variety of seeds that grow into nourishing fruits and vegetables, essential for your survival and health. The game's advanced farming mechanics require careful tending of your crops, including regular watering and protection from the elements, making each harvest a rewarding experience.

name: THE SIREEN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Loading times are longer and you may experience some map bugs (to be fixed soon)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
